DOC.brief_summary: To develop a cohort of COPD participants to assist study staff in determining the most likely candidates for future studies.
DOC.brief_title: A Registry of COPD Patients to be Used for Future Studies
DOC.detailed_description: To develop a cohort of COPD participants for study staff to determine the most likely candidates for future studies and to develop a repository of blood from subjects with COPD for future studies.
DOC.criteria: Patients who are 18 years of age and older who have been diagnosed with COPD by at least one of the following: clinical historya documented history of COPD, emphysema, or chronic bronchitis; pulmonary function results (defined as an FEV1/FVC less than 0.7; radiographic results (highresolution CT findings of emphysema in ability to give informed consent prisoners pregnancy
